desc: Official website of the Foster Falcons Athletic Booster Club. Includes merchandise sales, sport schedules, news and information on Foster High School Athletics.

layout.text: Foster High School Athletic Booster Club

The Foster High School Athletic Booster Club (FHSABC) exists to promote school spirit, provide support and to raise funds for ALL FHS sports.
FHSABC typically meets the 1st Monday of each month at 7 p.m. at the Foster High School Field House Meeting Room. Check our Facebook page for up to date meeting times.
